distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libcaca fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-0856: Fixed a divide by zero issue which could be exploited to cause
  an application crash (bsc#1197028).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: libcaca is affected by a Divide By Zero issue via img2txt, which allows a remote malicious user to cause a Denial of Service
notes.title: CVE description
